Text:
For those that download, this is the uncorrected 2006 remaster. 

http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/A_Charlie_Brown_Christmas_%28album%29#Controversy_over_2006_remaster

@Nitromethane
Yes, this version has some mistakes but most importantly... On track 7, "Skating", this new remaster has finally included the bass solo at the end; about 10 seconds! You see, the original version fades during the bass solo at the end and I always thought that was a pity. This version is way better. At least for that particular track.
